page.title: 07Home Life by a village child
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 a.m. when my radio alarm clock buzzes.I go down stairs and watch the television till the rest of my family get up.I wash,get dressed and have my breakfast of meusli and some milk.Then I get driven to school. I wait for my friends to come and we all go into school when the bell rings.My teacher calls the register and we begin our school work,.Most of the children have dinner at school but I bring sandwiches.After dinner we go out to play.During the afternoon we have a Science lesson and then all the children come together for Assembly when we sing a hymn and pray to God.We finish school at 3.30 p.m.I sometimes make my own tea.We watch television while we eat it and then I go out and play with my friends.Later, if there is a good programme I watch television till I go to bed at about 9.30 p.m.
